detail_desc: Imitation suede sandals with open toes and heels, an elastic strap at the back and shiny block heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a terry motif on the front, round neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Long-sleeved top in stretch jersey with a wide neckline and gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Scarves in patterned satin that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 30x80 cm.
Straight-style top in jersey crêpe with a boat neck. Short, wide sleeves with pleats and double-layered trims.
Low-necked T-shirt in soft slub jersey made from a cotton and modal blend with a seam down the back.
Dungarees in sweatshirt fabric made from soft organic cotton. Straps with press-studs, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the hems. Soft brushed inside.

Knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature, short sleeves and a drawstring at the hem of the top layer. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Knee-length jacket in lightweight, patterned viscose twill with dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and a gently rounded hem with slits in the sides. No fasteners.
Dressing gown in soft, patterned fleece with a hood, side pockets and tie belt at the waist.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Soft bra in transparent, zebra-striped mesh with triangular cups and shiny trims. Adjustable spaghetti straps, an elasticated hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. The polyester content of the bra is recycled.

Shirt in premium cotton with a cutaway collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Varying pattern on the inside of the cuffs and collar stand. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Chinos in cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Detachable, braided belt in imitation suede with a metal buckle.
Hairbands in a stretch weave with appliqués.
Shirt in washed cotton denim with a print motif. Collar, press-studs down the front, open chest pockets, long sleeves and cuffs with a press-stud.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with side pockets and tapered legs with foldover ribbing at the hems. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Long-sleeved jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and loops at the top of the shaft. Linings and insoles in soft faux shearling, and chunky soles.

Balconette bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape. Narrow, detachable shoulder straps that can be fastened in several different ways and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit, fluffy yarn with patch front pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Top in soft, stretch viscose jersey with a wide neckline, long dolman sleeves and a visible seam down the front and back.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Slip-on trainers in mesh with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
High-waisted sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a sculpting effect on the tummy, hips and legs. Wide waist panel.

Push-up lace bralette with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Set with a dress in viscose twill and gilet in soft faux shearling. Dress with a round neck, small opening and button at the back of the neck and flounced trim over the shoulders and along the front of the yoke. Long sleeves with concealed elastication and a frill at the cuffs, and a bell-shaped skirt. Unlined. Gilet with a concealed button at the front. Lined.
Top in organic cotton jersey with short cap sleeves.
Cropped top in jersey crêpe with short sleeves, a wrapover front and open back with wide ties at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Hood with a contrasting colour lining.
Hipster briefs in lace with a high waist, lined gusset, wide sides with elastic crossover straps and medium coverage at the back. The briefs are made partly from recycled polyamide.

Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft, loose knit with no buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.

Set with a bodysuit, pair of leggings and hat in printed organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch. Leggings with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist. Hat with ear appliqués at the top.
Metal earrings with an oblong pendant decorated with plastic stones. Length 5 cm.

Shirt woven in a stretch cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, darts at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist to create a fitted silhouette.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Padded gilet in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, detachable hood with a faux fur trim, and zipped side pockets. Lined.
Loafers in soft suede with a moccasin seam at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back. Fake welt back pockets and slim legs with creases.
Short, straight-cut T-shirt dress in sturdy cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline. Unlined.
Hairband in stretch cotton jersey with a sewn-on bow at the front.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a wide lace trim at the top. Low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and a string back.
Half-shaft wellingtons with a loop at the back and a print motif. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Long-sleeved top in airy mesh with ribbing around the neckline and seams front and back.
Trainers with lacing at the front, leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Padded gilet with a detachable, lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and welt side pockets. Lined.
Joggers in a soft, fine knit with a high, elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs.
V-neck top in satin with a lace trim at the top, narrow shoulder straps and a lace racer back with covered buttons.
Calf-length dress in woven fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a small V-neck. Buttons down the front, smocking at the back, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.
ACE TEE x H&M. V-neck top with a motif on the back and wrapover front with concealed press-studs and a plastic fastener at the hem. Dropped shoulders and long wide sleeves.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Sturdy hair elastics without metal clips. Diameter 5.5 cm.
Straight-cut, slightly longer shirt in cool silk with a pointed collar and classic front. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, a yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Shorts woven in a linen blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, two fake back pockets and short slits in the hems.
Vest top in airy jersey made from a silk and Tencel™ lyocell blend with a small V-neck front and back.

Sleeveless, ankle-length jumpsuit in a linen and viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Narrow elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist, concealed pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs.
Slim-fit jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly and press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.

Cold shoulder top in a textured cotton weave containing glittery threads. Narrow shoulder straps and embroidery at the neckline that continues down over the shoulders. Wide, elasticated smocking at the hem.
Fine-knit jumper in cotton slub yarn with long sleeves, a visible seam at the back and raw edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
V-neck playsuit in a crinkled weave with lace trims. Buttons at the top, wide, 3/4-length sleeves, an elasticated seam and tie belt at the waist and short, wide legs. Unlined.
Mesh trainers with rubber details, a padded top edge, lacing at the front and a loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Running jacket in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a mesh-lined hood, zip down the front and zipped chest pocket. Ventilation holes under the arms, ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Reflective details. Unlined. Tight fit. Size of chest pocket 10x17.5 cm.
Short-sleeved tunic in jersey with a slight sheen. Gently rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Trainers with lacing at the front and platform soles covered in braided jute. Canvas insoles and fluted soles. Platform approx. 4 cm.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Sports trousers in sturdy jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with zipped pockets and wide ribbing at the hems.
Bikini. Top with a lined front and narrow, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps. Bottoms with a lined gusset. The bikini lining is made of recycled polyester.

Gently fitted, single-breasted jacket woven in a soft Tencel™ lyocell blend with narrow notch lapels, a single button at the front and buttons at the cuffs. Chest pocket, flap patch pockets and a double back vent. Lined.
5-pocket trousers in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist and slim legs.
Sleeveless dress in a cotton weave with frill-trimmed shoulder straps and elastication at the back. Buttons down the front, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a round, roll-edge neckline, buttons down the front and long sleeves.
Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, button placket, flap chest pockets, long sleeves with a tab and button and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
